channel.title: Help Refreshing Client
channel.description: Hello, I want the user to select different maps, 317, 377, 508 etc. but I want the Client to refresh itself after it loads the maps. Right now, I have to relogin or go walk somewhere else for the map to load. Thanks!

item.title: Help Refreshing Client
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

Hello, I want the user to select different maps, 317, 377, 508 etc. but I want the Client to refresh itself after it loads the maps. Right now, I have to relogin or go walk somewhere else for the map to load. Thanks!

Read full topic
